014package org.jdbi.v3.guice.internal;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017
018import javax.annotation.CheckForNull;
019import javax.annotation.Nullable;
020import javax.inject.Inject;
021import javax.inject.Provider;
022
023import com.google.inject.Injector;
024import com.google.inject.Key;
025import com.google.inject.Scope;
026import com.google.inject.TypeLiteral;
027import com.google.inject.binder.LinkedBindingBuilder;
028import com.google.inject.binder.ScopedBindingBuilder;
029
030import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
031import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
032
033/**
034 * Binding builder for loose bindings (with optional default).
035 */
036public final class InternalLooseImportBindingBuilder<T> implements ScopedBindingBuilder {
037
038    private final InternalBindingProvider<T> provider;
039    private final Key<T> concreteType;
040    private final ScopedBindingBuilder scopedBindingBuilder;
041
042    public static <T> InternalLooseImportBindingBuilder<T> createLooseBinding(LinkedBindingBuilder<T> binder, Key<T> concreteType) {
043        checkNotNull(binder, "binder is null");
044        checkNotNull(concreteType, "concreteType is null");
045
046        return new InternalLooseImportBindingBuilder<>(binder, concreteType);
047    }
048
049    private InternalLooseImportBindingBuilder(LinkedBindingBuilder<T> binder, Key<T> concreteType) {
050        this.concreteType = concreteType;
051        this.provider = new InternalBindingProvider<>(concreteType);
052
053        this.scopedBindingBuilder = binder.toProvider(this.provider);
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * If the requested binding does not exist, bind the given default value.
058     */
059    public InternalLooseImportBindingBuilder<T> withDefault(@Nullable T value) {
060        this.provider.setDefaultValue(value);
061
062        return this;
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * Bind a different type as the given binding. This allows binding e.g. implementations to interface types.
067     */
068    public ScopedBindingBuilder to(Class<? extends T> clazz) {
069        checkNotNull(clazz, "clazz is null");
070
071        return to(TypeLiteral.get(clazz));
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Bind a different type as the given binding. This allows binding e.g. implementations to interface types.
076     */
077    public ScopedBindingBuilder to(TypeLiteral<? extends T> type) {
078        checkNotNull(type, "type is null");
079
080        this.provider.setKey(concreteType.ofType(type));
081
082        return this;
083    }
084
085    @Override
086    public void in(Class<? extends Annotation> scopeAnnotation) {
087        checkNotNull(scopeAnnotation, "scopeAnnotation is null");
088        this.scopedBindingBuilder.in(scopeAnnotation);
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public void in(Scope scope) {
093        checkNotNull(scope, "scope is null");
094        this.scopedBindingBuilder.in(scope);
095
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public void asEagerSingleton() {
100        this.scopedBindingBuilder.asEagerSingleton();
101    }
102
103    static final class InternalBindingProvider<T> implements Provider<T> {
104
105        private Key<? extends T> key;
106        private T defaultValue;
107        private Injector injector;
108
109        InternalBindingProvider(Key<? extends T> key) {
110            this.key = checkNotNull(key, "key is null");
111        }
112
113        InternalBindingProvider<T> setKey(Key<? extends T> key) {
114            this.key = checkNotNull(key, "key is null");
115            return this;
116        }
117
118        InternalBindingProvider<T> setDefaultValue(T defaultValue) {
119            this.defaultValue = defaultValue;
120            return this;
121        }
122
123        @Inject
124        void setInjector(final Injector injector) {
125            checkNotNull(injector, "injector is null");
126            checkState(this.injector == null, "setInjector() called multiple times!");
127
128            this.injector = injector;
129        }
130
131        @Override
132        @CheckForNull
133        public T get() {
134            checkState(this.injector != null, "calling get() before setInjector()!");
135
136            if (injector.getExistingBinding(key) == null) {
137                return defaultValue;
138            } else {
139                return injector.getInstance(key);
140            }
141        }
142    }
143}
